verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
By and by
when the morning comes,
When the saints of God
are gathered home,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
We’ll tell the story
how we've overcome;
For we'll understand
it better by and by.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
We are often tossed and driv’n on the restless sea of time,
Sombre skies and howling tempests oft succeed a bright sunshine,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
In that land of perfect day, when the mists have rolled away,
We will understand
it better by and by.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
We are often destitute of the things that life demands,
Want of food and want of shelter thirsty hills and barren lands,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
We are trusting in the Lord, and according to His word,
We will understand
it better by and by.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Trials dark on ev’ry hand, and we cannot understand,
All the ways that God would lead us to that blessed Promised Land;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
But He guides us with His eye and we’ll follow till we die,
For we’ll understand
it better by and by.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Temptations, hidden snares often take us unaware,
And our hearts are made to bleed for many a thoughtless word or deed,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
And we wonder why the test when we try to do our best,
But we’ll understand
it better by and by.
